Nuclear War: A Scenario is an upcoming film project in development by filmmaker Denis Villeneuve.
Production
In April 2024, a film adaptation of the book Nuclear War: A Scenario by Annie Jacobsen was put into development at Legendary Entertainment. Denis Villeneuve was producing the film with Tanya Lapointe, and Villeneuve may also direct or adapt the book.
